name: Community Sewing Class
description: Teaching basic sewing techniques, this class is geared for all sewing levels Beginning-Advanced. Participants will learn to sew garments using industrial sewing machinery. During this course, each week we will focus on these specific areas, such as installing zippers, collars, pockets, alterations, and garment construction.
